channel.title: Paper Airplanes in Zero Gravity - Digital Dumpster Fire
channel.description:
up until about 2 and 1/2 years ago, I had never even remotely experimented with creating music in a medium like this.
I had (still have) no clue what the hell i was doing, but over a period of 20+ months, I worked over 120+ collective hours working on this (and one other) track.
an incredibly large portion of that time i attribute to me, learning my way around the program and figuring out how to manipulate the sounds provided.
Please take the time to give this a listen, and make sure to wait for that drop.
(and if there is an issue with posting a youtube link as opposed to soundcloud, i apologize, i didnt see anything saying not to do so.)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NEGLc2I3gok
